scenes.background: [Monica] glances at [Bob] and raises an eyebrow.
scenes.description: 'So, does anyone actually want to go to a bar?'

options.text: Perhaps a bar is not the best idea for everyone. What do you think, Monica?
options.analysis: You considered others' preferences and sought Monica's opinion, showing good perception, empathy, and social skills.

options.text: A bar could be fun, but I see why some might be hesitant.
options.analysis: You recognized the potential downside while expressing tentative support, showing good self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Going to a bar isn't going to work for everyone. Let's think of something else.
options.analysis: You expressed your disagreement calmly, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
